message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,500. This is a fair price considering the value we both see in the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250? This considers the value it holds for both of us.
